content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment, Baihu Li. The apartment is a very attractive option for those looking for a comfortable living space in the heart of Munich. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains while providing a quality home for my tenants.

Based on the size of the apartment, which is 25 square meters, I believe that a rental price of 800 Euros per month would be reasonable. This price takes into account the current market rates in Munich and the cost of maintaining the apartment.

I am open to negotiation, but I am confident that this price is a fair and reasonable starting point. What are your thoughts on this proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. Thank you for your consideration. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 800 Euros per month, Baihu Li. I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to having you as my tenant.

Once you have signed the lease agreement, I will provide you with the necessary paperwork and information to move into the apartment. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns during the process.

Thank you again for your interest in renting my apartment, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE.

I want to see other options before signing the lease agreement.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Baihu Li
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
I apologize for any inconvenience, Baihu Li. If you would like to explore other options before signing the lease agreement, I completely understand.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to assist you during your search. I wish you the best of luck in finding the right apartment for your needs.

Thank you for your time and consideration, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
